Title: Relates to the use of a standardized immunization exemption form
Summary: Directs the use of a standardized immunization exemption form; requires the commissioner of health to develop a standardized medical immunization exemption request form for school use.
LawCode: Amd ยง2164, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to a standardized form for medical exemption from required immunizations
